page.title: 16Shopping (M)
page.content: We did a survey of shops in our area. There is a wide variety of family owned shops and one very large supermarket called Booths. The residential area in our block is about 20min. walk from the town centre which may explain the number of shops. The busiest small shop was the greengrocer. People interviewed said they liked to choose their own fresh fruit. Both the small shops and Booths said their busiest day was Saturday. The small shops employed about 5 people each and Booths employed 92 staff. Most people said they did one large shop per week and 3/4 of Booths shoppers said they usually shopped there and lived nearby. We counted 90 cars in the car-park. The Booths in our area was opened in 1982 but the Booths company was started in Preston, in 1847.
